name: .SVSLIDE File Extension
summary: Learn about .SVSLIDE files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Those who do not have access to a Sakura VisionTek Digital Microscope can open and view SVSLIDE images using OpenSlide (cross-platform), ImageJ (cross-platform), or NetScope Viewer (Windows).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
